creditline: Gift of Edith and Norman Garmezy
inscription:
Signature, Inscription

on verso, bottom center, in pencil: [Little Girls]
provenance: (Thomas French Fine Art, Fairlawn, Ohio); sold to Garmezy, 1998; Edith and Norman Garmezy, Edina, Minn., until 2008; given to MIA.
signed: in the plate, LRC: [Theodore Roussel]; LRC, in graphite: [Theodore Roussel / (illegible)]
title: Little Girls and Perambulators, Chelsea Embankment
